resources.string: Welcome to our innovative surveillance app! Use our high-quality cameras with face and object detection to ensure maximum security. Monitor your surroundings in real-time and respond quickly to potential threats. Download the app now and experience a new level of security!
Disable face/object detection and push notifications.\n(Camera remains active.)
Dark Mode: A visually appealing design with a dark color scheme.\nLight Mode: A standard design with a light color scheme.

We, Hochschule Heilbronn Sontheim, are the provider and operator of the surveillance camera app. In the following, we inform you about the collection, processing, and use of your personal data in connection with the use of our app.\n\n
Our surveillance camera app requires certain access rights to provide you with all functions. The following access rights and data are required:\n\n
The app requires access to push notifications to provide you with important notifications about activities or events captured by the surveillance camera.\n
The app requires access to the vibration function of your device to provide you with haptic feedback for incoming notifications.\n
The app requires access to the sound of your device to display audible notifications for captured events.\n
The data captured by the app is stored as follows:\n\n
IP address: The IP address is stored in the log files of MediaMTX for the purpose of connection.\n\n
Email address, first name, and last name: These data are stored in the app for authorization during registration.\n\n
There is no evaluation of user behavior or data by tracking tools such as Apptrace, Apptrace, Adeven, App Annie, or Google Analytics for Apps.\n\n
Transfer of data to third parties:\n
Your data will not be transferred to third parties.\n\n

You have the right to access, correct, block, or delete your personal data. Images captured by the surveillance camera are stored on a Django server and automatically deleted after an adjustable period of time. Additionally, you have the option to delete images through the app itself.\n\n
If you have any questions or wish to exercise your rights, you can contact us using the contact details above. We are happy to assist you.\n\n
Please note that the privacy policy has been prepared in accordance with applicable data protection laws and is subject to changes and updates. We will inform you of any changes, if necessary.
Please enter a valid email address
